metadata.name: Potential DLL Injection Or Execution Using Tracker.exe
metadata.comment: Detects potential DLL injection and execution using "Tracker.exe"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\tracker.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('tracker') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /d ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /c '))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /errorreport:prompt ')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msbuild\\current\\bin\\msbuild.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msbuild\\current\\bin\\amd64\\msbuild.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects potential DLL injection and execution using "Tracker.exe"
